SQL.SQLRaw: SELECT c.Codigo_Cuenta,c.Desc_Cuenta,c.Cod1,c.Cod3,c.Cod5,c.Cod7, CASE WHEN c.Cod1 BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN '1' END AS UtilBruta, (SELECT min(Fecha_Desde) FROM mt01peco WHERE Periodo BETWEEN {desdeper} AND {hastaper}) AS fechaDesde, (SELECT max(Fecha_Hasta) FROM mt01peco WHERE Periodo BETWEEN {desdeper} AND {hastaper}) AS fechaHasta, (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod1) AS Desc1, (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod3) AS Desc3, (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod5) AS Desc5, (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod7) AS Desc7, (SELECT EsdeMovimiento FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod7) AS esdemov7, [ {nivelCuenta}] as nivel, C.TotDeb-C.TotCred as SaldoPer,C.TotDeb-C.TotCred+CASE WHEN c.SaldoAnt is null THEN 0 ELSE c.SaldoAnt END as SaldoActual FROM (SELECT a.Codigo_Cuenta,a.Desc_Cuenta, LEFT(a.Codigo_Cuenta,1) AS Cod1,LEFT(a.Codigo_Cuenta,3) AS Cod3,LEFT(a.Codigo_Cuenta,5) AS Cod5,LEFT(a.Codigo_Cuenta,7) AS Cod7, (SELECT SUM(Total_Debitos - Total_Creditos)*1 FROM dt01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=a.Codigo_Cuenta [and Periodo between CASE WHEN {acumper} = '01' THEN '00' ELSE {desdeper} END and RIGHT(CONCAT('00',(CAST({desdeper} AS INT)-1)),2)]) as SaldoAnt, sum(b.Total_Debitos) as TotDeb,sum(b.Total_Creditos) as TotCred FROM dt01cuen b join en01cuen a on b.Codigo_Cuenta=a.Codigo_Cuenta WHERE (1=1) [AND len(a.Codigo_Cuenta) <= {nivelCuenta}] [AND (b.Periodo between {desdeper} and {hastaper})] AND (b.Codigo_Cuenta between '4' and 'z') AND ((Len(b.Codigo_Cuenta) = {nivelCuenta}) or(a.EsdeMovimiento=1)) GROUP BY a.Codigo_Cuenta,a.Desc_Cuenta) c WHERE (c.TotDeb<>0) or (c.TotCred<>0) or (c.SaldoAnt<>0) [ or (1 IN ({mostraceros,VALUE})) ]

QueryColumn.Name: UtilBruta
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN c.Cod1 BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN '1' END AS

QueryColumn.Name: fechaDesde
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT min(Fecha_Desde) FROM mt01peco WHERE Periodo BETWEEN {desdeper} AND {hastaper}) AS

QueryColumn.Name: fechaHasta
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT max(Fecha_Hasta) FROM mt01peco WHERE Periodo BETWEEN {desdeper} AND {hastaper}) AS

QueryColumn.Name: Desc1
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod1) AS

QueryColumn.Name: Desc3
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod3) AS

QueryColumn.Name: Desc5
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod5) AS

QueryColumn.Name: Desc7
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Desc_Cuenta FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod7) AS

QueryColumn.Name: esdemov7
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT EsdeMovimiento FROM en01cuen WHERE Codigo_Cuenta=c.Cod7) AS

QueryColumn.Name: SaldoActual
QueryColumn.ColumnName: C.TotDeb-C.TotCred+CASE WHEN c.SaldoAnt is null THEN 0 ELSE c.SaldoAnt END as

CriteriaItem.Name: desdeper
CriteriaItem.Title: desde Periodo
CriteriaItem.CriteriaDefaults: <SqlValor>SELECT Periodo as Valor FROM mt01peco WHERE (SELECT CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) between Fecha_Desde and Fecha_Hasta</SqlValor>

Query.SQLRaw: SELECT Periodo ,Descripcion,CONCAT(Periodo,' .') as Desc2 FROM Mt01peco

CriteriaItem.Name: hastaper
CriteriaItem.Title: hasta Periodo
CriteriaItem.CriteriaDefaults: <SqlValor>SELECT Periodo as Valor FROM mt01peco WHERE (SELECT CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) between Fecha_Desde and Fecha_Hasta</SqlValor>

Query.SQLRaw: SELECT Periodo ,Descripcion,CONCAT(Periodo,' .') as Desc2 FROM Mt01peco
